description: Paste the input image into the input canvas image. Depending on parameters, it can replace or merge existing voxel values.

image_dimension.title: Image dimension
image_dimension.description: Specify the dimension of the images.

input_canvas_image.title: Input canvas image
input_canvas_image.description: The canvas image on which the input image will be pasted.

input_image.title: Input image
input_image.description: The image to be pasted onto the canvas.

start_index.title: Start index
start_index.description: The starting index where the input image will be pasted on the canvas.

background_label.title: Background label
background_label.description: The label value considered as background.

paint_over_non_background_voxels.title: Paint over non-background voxels
paint_over_non_background_voxels.description: Defines behavior when the input image voxel is non-background and the corresponding canvas voxel is background: 0 - leave as is, 1 - replace with input voxel value, 2 - replace with conflict label.

conflict_label.title: Conflict label
conflict_label.description: The label value used for conflicting non-background voxels if 'paintOverNonBackgroundVoxels' is set to 2.
